greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: For those rows n of A249223 which are weakly increasing, let w(n) denote the maximal entry in the row: sequence gives values of n for which w(n) sets a new record.
comment: This is a companion to A250071 (and is derived from the data for that sequence), which lists the first time k appears as a width.
The record values are 1, 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 9, 12, 16, 18, 20, but more data is needed to identify this sequence.
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 23 2021
